results.definition: the effort contributed by a person in bringing about a result
examples: they all did their share of the work

results.definition: assets belonging to or due to or contributed by an individual person or group
examples: he wanted his share in cash

results.definition: a sharp steel wedge that cuts loose the top layer of soil
the allotment of some amount by dividing something
examples: death gets more than its share of attention from theologians

results.definition: give out as one's portion or share
have, give, or receive a share of
any of the equal portions into which the capital stock of a corporation is divided and ownership of which is evidenced by a stock certificate
examples: he bought 100 shares of IBM at the market price
I'd like to share this idea with you
Our children share a love of music
The two countries share a long border
